Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem at California. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem at California.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Stetson/Randolph
ShortDescription: Northbound 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus and Wacker : due to, street blockage near Stetson/Randolph.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus and Wacker : due to, street blockage near Stetson/Randolph.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Wacker/Harbor
ShortDescription: Northbound 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore, Monroe, Michigan, Wacker & Columbus: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Harbor

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore, Monroe, Michigan, Wacker and Columbus: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Harbor.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
